name: Rossignol BlackOps Dreamer XP Skis + Bindings - Girls'
description: Young shredders will love these skis. The BlackOps Dreamer fits the bill for getting in groomed laps or going beyond the resort. Versatile, floaty and agile, they suit intermediate to advanced skiers looking for a playful ride. The powder-turn rocker ads grip on the groomers while the tip and tail offer flotation and steering control.Rossitop cap and extended core construction strengthens the ski and facilitates rebound for control in varied conditions.Poplar wood core keeps the weight low while offering the progressive flex and pop we love.Torsional stability and durability is provided by fibreglass reinforcement.Centred sidecut for controlled turns.Powder turn rocker for ski performance in both hard and soft snow.Includes Look XPress 10 GW B93 bindings with a 2.5-10 DIN range.
